# Your Moments of Hand Hygiene## 1. Before entering the kitchen/dining room or picking up food from servery
- **Stock**:
- Be between handling different food items (i.e., veggies, chicken, etc.)## 2. After handling dirty dishes and waste
- **When leaving the kitchen or dining room**
- Ensure proper hand hygiene after handling food and waste.## 3. Additional Notes
- Always wash hands thoroughly with soap and water.
- Use hand sanitizer if soap and water are not available.
